thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Pylona
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Pylona

author: Pylona
title: Pylona
text: The Logo Company has done a phenomenal job with the customer experience!!! It's apparent that they have given a lot of thought to the systems that they use to communicate and deliver products. They have built a lot of value into their work, for example, usually you get one design and you go back and forth with the designer until you have the final product. This company gives you four design concepts from four EXTREMELY TALENTED designers. I was blown away by the quality of the product and the customer service experience. This by far is the best experience I have ever had with a graphic design company and I highly recommend them!
